verses.verse: God, <S%G2316><s%> who at sundry <S%G4181><s%> times and in divers <S%G4187><s%> manners <S%G4187><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> in time <S%G3819><s%> past <S%G3819><s%> to the fathers <S%G3962><s%> by the prophets, <S%G4396><s%>

Has in these <S%G5130><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> spoken <S%G2980><s%> to us by his Son, <S%G5207><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> he has appointed <S%G5087><s%> heir <S%G2818><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> things, by whom <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> he made <S%G4160><s%> the worlds; <S%G165><s%>

Who being the brightness <S%G541><s%> of his glory, <S%G1391><s%> and the express <S%G5481><s%> image <S%G5481><s%> of his person, <S%G5287><s%> and upholding <S%G5342><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things by the word <S%G4487><s%> of his power, <S%G1411><s%> when he had by himself <S%G1438><s%> purged <S%G4160><s%> <S%G2512><s%> our sins, <S%G266><s%> sat <S%G2523><s%> down <S%G2523><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the right <S%G1188><s%> hand of the Majesty <S%G3172><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> high: <S%G5308><s%>

Being made <S%G1096><s%> so <S%G5118><s%> much <S%G5118><s%> better <S%G2909><s%> than the angels, <S%G32><s%> as he has by inheritance <S%G2820><s%> obtained <S%G2816><s%> a more excellent <S%G1313><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> they.

For to which <S%G5101><s%> of the angels <S%G32><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> he at <S%G4218><s%> any <S%G4218><s%> time, <S%G4218><s%> You are <S%G1488><s%> my Son, <S%G5207><s%> this <S%G4594><s%> day <S%G4594><s%> have I begotten <S%G1080><s%> you? And again, <S%G3825><s%> I will be to him a Father, <S%G3962><s%> and he shall be to me a Son? <S%G5207><s%>

And again, <S%G3825><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> he brings <S%G1521><s%> in the first-begotten <S%G4416><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world, <S%G3625><s%> he said, <S%G3004><s%> And let all <S%G3956><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> worship <S%G4352><s%> him.

And of the angels <S%G32><s%> he said, <S%G3004><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> makes <S%G4160><s%> his angels <S%G32><s%> spirits, <S%G4151><s%> and his ministers <S%G3011><s%> a flame <S%G5395><s%> of fire. <S%G4442><s%>

But to the Son <S%G5207><s%> he said, Your throne, <S%G2362><s%> O God, <S%G2316><s%> is for ever <S%G165><s%> and ever: <S%G165><s%> a scepter <S%G4464><s%> of righteousness <S%G2118><s%> is the scepter <S%G4464><s%> of your kingdom. <S%G932><s%>

You have loved <S%G25><s%> righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> and hated <S%G3404><s%> iniquity; <S%G458><s%> therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> even your God, <S%G2316><s%> has anointed <S%G5548><s%> you with the oil <S%G1637><s%> of gladness <S%G20><s%> above <S%G3844><s%> your fellows. <S%G3353><s%>

And, You, Lord, <S%G2962><s%> in the beginning <S%G746><s%> have laid the foundation <S%G2311><s%> of the earth; <S%G1093><s%> and the heavens <S%G3772><s%> are the works <S%G2041><s%> of your <S%G4675><s%> hands: <S%G5495><s%>
They shall perish; <S%G622><s%> but you remain; <S%G1265><s%> and they all <S%G3956><s%> shall wax <S%G3822><s%> old <S%G3822><s%> as does a garment; <S%G2440><s%>

And as a clothing <S%G4018><s%> shall you fold <S%G1667><s%> them up, and they shall be changed: <S%G236><s%> but you are <S%G1488><s%> the same, <S%G846><s%> and your years <S%G2094><s%> shall not fail. <S%G1587><s%>

But to which <S%G5101><s%> of the angels <S%G32><s%> said <S%G2046><s%> he at <S%G4218><s%> any <S%G4218><s%> time, <S%G4218><s%> Sit <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> my right <S%G1188><s%> hand, until <S%G2193><s%> I make <S%G5087><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> enemies <S%G2190><s%> your footstoo? <S%G5286><s%> <S%G4228><s%>

Are they not all <S%G3956><s%> ministering <S%G3010><s%> spirits, <S%G4151><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> forth <S%G649><s%> to minister <S%G1248><s%> for them who shall be heirs <S%G2816><s%> of salvation? <S%G4991><s%>
